title: What languages (ie English, Kannada, Hindi) do we need to take in Pesu
content: I will be joining Pesu rr campus this year and was am wondering whether taking kannada is compulsory or not because Im not a native speaker.

comments.body:
You don't need to take Kannada. Knowing english is sufficient.

But I think you should and learn basic kannada. Like words and phrases that will help you get around the city. I'm also not a kannadiga (though i am a resident) but knowing to speak kannada has been helpful.
Bruh unlike how it's portrayed in the media English alone is more than enough,  belive it or that more people speak Tamil,  Telugu and Malayalam in pes than kannada bro ðŸ˜‚
U can join linguista club where they'll teach you kannada, but English is enough
Relax bro it's a uni, english is enough
I would advise you to learn chinese, It would help you in being able to communicate with a large number of people.
only in VTU, kannada subject is compulsory. Its not needed in PESU.
I think most of the ppl mistook me. I meant is there a compulsory subject of language that we need to take and write exams for like there is in BMSIT (kannada is mandatory subject to take over there)
So there aren't any language exams we need to write?
Thank goododdd. And thank you too for sharing this info
What do you mean? Its an English medium school.
You're wrong lmao pes has majority kannada students especially in engineering and computer science , there might be telugus but tamilians and mallus no way!!
